outputs.output_descr: Key Government departments have the capacity to protect and promote human rights, ratify core human rights treaties, implement and report on treaty obligations, effectively implement treaty body recommendations and engage with UN special procedures and the Universal Periodic Review

Key Government departments have the capacity to protect and promote human rights, ratify core human rights treaties, implement and report on treaty obligations, effectively implement treaty body recommendations and engage with UN special procedures and the Universal Periodic Review

project_descr: Government is aware of, respects and provides for people's human rights while it empowers citizens to demand theprotection of those rights from government
project_title: Human Rights Programme in Papua New Guinea
